snippet: Nike said it expected annual revenue to grow 63 percent to $50 billion by 2020, with sales in its women’s category set to double during the period.
lead_paragraph: Nike said it expected annual revenue to grow 63 percent to $50 billion by 2020, with sales in its women’s category set to double during the period.

headline.main: Nike Foresees $50 Billion in Sales in Five Years
headline.print_headline: Nike Foresees $50 Billion In Sales In Five Years
